price: Bemeramana! Urugamba rwa Uhudi rutaraba, mwari mushashaye guhangana n’umwansi, kugira mupfire Imana Allah nk’abavandimwe banyu bayipfiriye ku rugamba rwa Badri, ng’urwo nya rugamba rero rwamaze gushika, nimwihangane mururwane urupfu mururaba n’amaso yanyu.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كُنتُمۡ تَمَنَّوۡنَ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن تَلۡقَوۡهُ فَقَدۡ رَأَيۡتُمُوهُ وَأَنتُمۡ تَنظُرُونَ

meta.transliteration: walaqad kuntum tamannawna al-mawta min qabli an talqawhu faqad ra-aytumūhu wa-antum tanẓurūna
